objects.text: Cotton Canvas | Zippered Pocket | Detachable Strap

product_details.description: Put together the perfect daily ensemble with this standout floral tote bag. It offers practicality and stylish elegance in a unique floral print, woven details, and rectangular silhouettes. Small tote purse measures 11" x 8.8" x 3.8" (Drop 5.2"). Carry this top handle handbag by the double handles, or simply clip on the detachable strap and turn it into a crossbody bag for hands-free convenience. Womens handbag features a top zipper closure, a zippered pocket, 2 open pockets on the interior, and a cc pocket on the back. This one-of-a-kind women's cute tote bags comes in various eye-catching combinations in vibrant colors, adding visual interest to any outfit. Fabric type - Cotton Canvas ** Origin - Imported **

banner_details:
This stylish promotional banner features a centered floral-patterned top-handle purse image (`product_image`), visually anchoring the layout. The background (`background`) uses a soft pink gradient with subtle circular and wave accents, giving a modern and feminine feel. The bold heading text (`heading`) sits prominently at the top in a deep magenta hue, drawing attention to the brand name. Below it, a smaller subheading (`subheading`) describes the product type in a serif font. Key features are listed beneath the image in an easy-to-read format (`description`). The price (`price`) is centrally emphasized above a bold call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`), encouraging immediate purchase.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink (#F5E1E8) – background
- Soft Magenta (#F294B8) – decorative elements
- Deep Berry (#B4124B) – headline, price, and CTA background
- Rich Plum (#922B5D) – subheading and description
- White (#FFFFFF) – CTA text
product_color: The product image showcases a bold and vibrant handbag with a dominant pink color palette. Key colors include hot pink (#E03A7F), baby pink (#F4B2C2), black (#1A1A1A), and white (#FFFFFF). The hot pink serves as the base and brand-highlight color, creating high visual impact. Baby pink softens the overall tone, while black outlines and fills enhance the floral pattern, providing depth and contrast. White accents harmonize the visuals and add lightness. These colors are strategically blended to highlight the intricate floral motifs and branding, offering both vibrancy and clarity, making them ideal for a high-energy, fashion-forward advertisement banner.
